javadoc.text: * Unit upper triangular dense matrix. Almost the same as the{@link no.uib.cipr.matrix.UpperTriangDenseMatrix UpperTriangDenseMatrix}, * but additionally assumes the main diagonal to be all ones. However it does * not access it, so it may be actually be different.

javadoc.param: nSize of the matrix. Since the matrix must be square, this * equals both the number of rows and columns

javadoc.text: * Constructor for UnitUpperTriangDenseMatrix. Matrix is copied from the * supplied matrix
javadoc.param: AMatrix to copy from. Only the strictly upper triangular part * is copied

javadoc.text: * Constructor for UnitUpperTriangDenseMatrix. Matrix is copied from the * supplied matrix
javadoc.param: AMatrix to copy from. Only the strictly upper triangular part * is copied
deepIf true, A is copied, else a shallow copy is * made and the matrices share underlying storage. For this, * A must be a dense matrix
